diff_hunk:
@@ -650,6 +650,9 @@
 
 - name: zeros  # fallthrough
 
+- name: _standard_gamma(Tensor self, Generator generator)
+  self: grad * output._standard_gamma_grad(self)
body:
The syntax and naming here is different from the other derivative definitions. (output becomes self and self becomes alpha). It doesn't look like _standard_gamma_grad is used outside of the derivative definition. Can we re-order and re-name the arguments? e.g.

```
_standard_gamma_grad(self, output).mul_(grad)
```

or fuse the gradient multiplication:

```
_standard_gamma_grad(grad, self, output)
```
body_html:

or fuse the gradient multiplication:

body_text:
The syntax and naming here is different from the other derivative definitions. (output becomes self and self becomes alpha). It doesn't look like _standard_gamma_grad is used outside of the derivative definition. Can we re-order and re-name the arguments? e.g.
_standard_gamma_grad(self, output).mul_(grad)

or fuse the gradient multiplication:
